lines.text: Run for your dear little lives. She is a witch, and means to eat you for her supper!
Ach!
Und himmel!

[in unison, to the Witch]
Ahhh, your mother rides a vacuum cleaner!

[sung to the tune "Rock-a-Bye Baby" as Witch Hazel prepares Bugs' grave]
"Rock-a-bye rabbit, in the hot oven, into my mouth for dinner I'll shoven..."

[as a truant officer]
You oughta be ashamed of yourself - roasting children!

[innocently]
Call it a weakness.
And pray, what are your names, my poor children?

[smiling]
My name is Gretel.
And my name is Hansel.

[entirely puzzled]
Hansel? Hannnsel? Hansel?
This looks like a job for the Masked Avenger! But since he's not around, I guess I'll have to take care of it myself.

[to the audience, as she prepares riding her broom]
Notice how I ride sidesaddle. It proves I'm a lady of quality.
What's cooking? I get to lick the pot! I get to lick the pot!
Get your hands out of that pot. Go out until I call you.
[last lines]

[to the audience, as he prepares leaving with the bunny beauty]
Ah sure, I know. But aren't they all witches inside?
Well, thanks a large for bringing me out of that, mac. But you're looking for Snow White, this here's the story of Hansel and Gretel.

[entirely puzzled]
Hansel? Hannnsel? Hansel? Han-sel?
Me and my generous impulses!
